# Usage

```shell
usage: run_amplify [-h] [-t TOKEN]

reference program by amplify

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  -t TOKEN, --token TOKEN
                        If not specified, input at runtime.
```

## Example

```shell
$ ./run_amplify.py
```
